code: export var byTextAscending=function byTextAscending(getTextProperty){return function(objectA,objectB){var upperA=getTextProperty(objectA).toUpperCase();var upperB=getTextProperty(objectB).toUpperCase();if(upperA<upperB){return-1;}if(upperA>upperB){return 1;}return 0;};};export var byTextDescending=function byTextDescending(getTextProperty){return function(objectA,objectB){var upperA=getTextProperty(objectA).toUpperCase();var upperB=getTextProperty(objectB).toUpperCase();if(upperA>upperB){return-1;}if(upperA<upperB){return 1;}return 0;};};
